results.title: AMPK downregulates ALK2 via increasing the interaction between Smurf1 and Smad6, leading to inhibition of osteogenic differentiation.
results.journal: Biochim Biophys Acta Mol Cell Res
results.text_hl: To evaluate the biological relevance of @GENE_PRKAB1 @GENE_5564 @@@AMPK@@@ action on @GENE_ACVR1 @GENE_90 @@@ALK2@@@ activity, we induced @<m>DISEASE_Myositis_Ossificans</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009221 @@@FOP@@@ fibroblasts into iPS cells and found that their osteogenic differentiation in vitro was inhibited by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Lin H, Ying Y, Wang YY, Wang G, Jiang SS, Huang D, Luo L, Chen YG, Gerstenfeld LC, Luo Z. AMPK downregulates ALK2 via increasing the interaction between Smurf1 and Smad6, leading to inhibition of osteogenic differentiation. Biochim Biophys Acta Mol Cell Res. 2017 Dec;1864(12):2369-2377. PMID: 28847510
